summary: Two boys meet at an opera training school in Peking in 1924. Their resulting friendship will span nearly 70 years and will endure some of the most troublesome times in China's history.
cast: Leslie Cheung|Fengyi Zhang|Li Gong|You Ge|Da Ying|Qi Lü|Han Lei|Di Tong|Zhi Yin|Mingwei Ma|Hailong Zhao|Yang Fei|Dan Li|Yongchao Yang|Fei Huang|Wenli Jiang|Yitong Zhi|Chun Li|David Wu
title: Adiós a mi concubina
